page.title: 13Games we play
page.content: In our survey we asked over{100}boys and girls between {5}and{11}what were their favourite games both indoor and outdoor. { {GIRLS AGE INDOOR OUTDOOR 5 HOUSE,TOYS SKIPPING 7 SCRABBLE HOUSE 8 MARBLES NETBALL 9 DRAUGHTS NETBALL 10 COMPUTER NETBALL,ROUNDERS 11 BOARDGAMES ROUNDERS {BOYS }5 CARS RUNNING 7 LEGO,SNOOKER FOOTBALL 8 TABLE TENNIS FOOTBALL 9 BOARDGAMES FOOTBALL 10 COMPUTER FOOTBALL 11 BOARDGAMES FOOTBALL In the younger section{toys}apeared quite often also{boardgames}apeared a lot in all age groups.For boys throughout the school{football}was most popular game.
